articles.author: Luke Bouma
articles.title: Amazon Is Shutting Down Kindle Download & Transfer Via USB - Cord Cutters News
articles.description: Amazon Kindle users are no strangers to the divide that splits many tech communities: those who stick to the company’s streamlined ecosystem and those who prefer to chart their own course. Much like Android fans who bypass Google Play to source apps elsewhere…
